posts.author: Quotidiano di Puglia.it
posts.title: Ducati Panigale V4, svelata ad Eicma la prima 4 cilindri di
posts.text:
Ducati Panigale V4, svelata ad Eicma la prima 4 cilindri di Borgo Panigale derivata dalla MotoGP di Francesco Irace 1 SPECIALE EICMA INTERESSANTE ALD presenta "2W: due ruote, zero pensieri". L'innovativa proposta di mobilità motociclistica FRIZZANTE Vespa Sprint, aggiornamenti stilistici e tecnici per l'evergreen scooter di Piaggio EICMA Eicma, Ministro Madia e Pres. Confindustria Boccia inaugurano la 75/ma edizione. Keanu Reeves, Agostini, Biaggi, e Cairoli testimonial MILANO - Come preannunciato nei mesi scorsi, Ducati svela a Eicma 2017 la nuova Panigale V4, prima moto del marchio bolognese ad essere equipaggiata con un motore quattro cilindri strettamente derivato da quello utilizzato in MotoGP.
La nuova Panigale V4 andrà a sostituire la 1299, da cui eredita gran parte del design pur essendo dotata di alcuni dettagli ancora più aggressivi, soprattutto nella parte frontale. Il cuore, vero e proprio elemento di spicco della nuova moto, è un quattro cilindri a V da 1.103 cc capace di sviluppare ben 214 cv a 13.000 giri/min esprimendo un rapporto peso/potenza di 1,1 cv/kg. Tuttavia attingendo dal catalogo accessori e montando lo scarico che Akrapovic ha realizzato su specifiche del reparto Ducati Corse, la potenza della V4 Panigale può arrivare fino a 226 cv.
Sarà proposta sul mercato anche in una versione S, equipaggiata con raffinate sospensioni Ohlins con sistema Smart EC 2.0 e componentistica di altissimo livello come le ruote forgiate in alluminio e la batteria agli ioni di litio, e nella variante Speciale, realizzata in serie limitata con una livrea dedicata, cerchi forgiati in magnesio e scarico in titanio.
Il maggior (inevitabile) peso della moto è stato compensato dalla presenza di un nuovo telaio perimetrale “Front Frame” più compatto e leggero, che sfrutta proprio il motore come elemento portante. Anche l'elettronica, infine, che beneficia del know how acquisito dall'azienda nelle corse, rappresenta il massimo che si può chiedere oggi da una moto sportiva. La piattaforma inerziale a sei assi di Bosch rappresenta un vero e proprio cervello realizzato per rendere la moto più performante e più sicura allo stesso tempo. Spiccano, tra i tanti sistemi, l'ABS cornering con controlli inediti per gestire la derapat e il QuickShift up & down.
 1 Lunedì 6 Novembre 07-11-2017 11:21 0 di 0 commenti presenti ECONOMIA

thread.section_title: Scottish Budget proposals – Wright Vigar TaxApp
thread.title: Scottish Budget proposals
thread.title_full: Scottish Budget proposals

posts.author: wrightvigartaxapp
posts.title: Scottish Budget proposals
posts.text:
On 14 December, the Scottish Budget will set out the Scottish Government’s financial and tax plans.
Currently taxpayers who are resident in Scotland pay income tax on their non-savings and non-dividend income at rates and thresholds determined by the Scottish Government. Scottish higher and additional rate taxpayers may pay more income tax than those with similar income in the rest of the UK. The Scottish Parliament is considering plans to radically revise the bands and possibly to introduce some further income tax rates so that middle and higher earners pay additional tax.
The Scottish Parliament are also expected to announce the details of Air Departure Tax which takes effect for flights from Scotland from April 2018.
We will keep you up to date with pertinent announcements.
Internet links: BBC news

posts.title: Андрей Шевченко продолжит работу со сборной Украины
posts.text:
Главный тренер национальной сборной Украины Андрей Шевченко сохранил свой пост. 

Вчера на заседании Исполкома ФФУ было принято решение, что нынешний наставник сборной продолжит работу с командой. 

Напомним, что Андрей Шевченко принял команду после Евро-2016 во Франции. Под его руководством украинцы заняли третье место в группе в рамках отбора на ЧМ-2018 и лишились права поехать на "Мундиаль" в Россию.

thread.title_full: Klub Thailand Chainat FC Berhenti Kejar Egy Maulana Vikri – SportSatu

posts.author: Frengky Aruan
posts.title: Klub Thailand Chainat FC Berhenti Kejar Egy Maulana Vikri – SportSatu
posts.text:
Home > Bola Nasional > Klub Thailand Chainat FC Berhenti Kejar Egy Maulana Vikri Klub Thailand Chainat FC Berhenti Kejar Egy Maulana Vikri By Frengky Aruan on November 7, 2017 
Klub Thailand, Chainat Hornbill FC berhenti mengejar pemain timnas U-19 Indonesia, Egy Maulana Vikri. Ini berdasarkan informasi yang berkembang di Thailand. 
Ini setelah wakil Presiden sekaligus manajer Chainat Hornbill FC Anurat Nakasai berkali-kali membenarkan ketertarikan kepada Egy, yang sebelumnya masuk dalam datar 60 pemain muda potensial versi media Inggris, The Guardian. 
Ketertarikan awal ditunjukan melalui surat tawaran per 2 Oktober 2017. Dalam suratnya, The Hornbills mengajak pihak Egy Maulana Vikri berdiskusi soal kemungkinan penandatanganan kontrak. 
Chainat Hornbill FC dilaporkan juga menawarkan kontrak berdurasi dua tahun dengan nilai gaji sebesar 7.000 dolar AS atau sekitar 231 ribu Baht atau 95 juta rupiah per bulan. 
Chainat Hornbill FC turut membuka peluang untuk Egy Maulana Vikri trial di Jerman. 
Ini merupakan bagian keseriusan Chainat Hornbill menyambut musim baru. Seperti diketahui, The Hornbills menjadi juara Thai League 2 2017 sehingga mengantongi tiket promosi mentas di kasta tertinggi, Thai League 1. 
Pihak Chainat FC sempat tak yakin dan merasa peluang mendapatkan Egy Maulana Vikri tipis, sebelum benar-benar tampak menyerah. 
Adanya keinginan kuat pihak keluarga agar Egy Maulana Vikri bermain di Eropa dibanding ASEAN menjadi sebab. Negosiasi pun dilaporkan diakhiri. 
Selain Chainat Hornbill FC, Egy Maulana Vikri diketahui diinginkan klub seperti SL Benfica, FC Pacos de Ferreira. Klub-klub itu mengajak Egy Maulana Vikri untuk trial lebih dulu. 
Tak hanya Egy Maulana, beberapa pemain Indonesia dilaporkan juga diminati klub Thailand menyusul adanya penambahan slot pemain asing, yang diperuntukan untuk pemain ASEAN. 
Klub Thailand yang tertarik diantaranya Chiangrai United dan Chiangmai FC, seperti disampaikan pelatih Persija Jakarta, Stefano Cugurra Teco. 
Sementara itu, salah satu agensi pemain di Thailand, i-sports sebelumnya dilaporkan memasukkan Evan Dimas dalam daftar pemain ASEAN yang ingin dibawa ke Thailand selain Thanabalan Nadarajah (Malaysia). 49

posts.author: Info PAS (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: CURSO DE CAPACITACIÓN CONTINUADA EN PARANÁ
posts.text:
Se encuentra abierta las inscripciones para el último curso del año de capacitación continuada 2017, brindado por APASER.

El curso se realizará el viernes 01 de diciembre en Urquiza 1226, de la ciudad de Paraná.

La modalidad del mismo es taller, y estará a cargo el Lic. Fernando Mc Louhglin.

Temarios:
“La tecnología: el nuevo desafío del productor asesor de seguros”
“Seguro de Responsabilidad Civil Profesional”
Horario de acreditación: 9 a 9.30 hs.

Recuerde que para hacer uso del descuento, tiene que tener pago un año de cuotas societarias.

El curso termina a las 15.30 hs. tener en cuenta para tomar los recaudos necesarios, ya que no se puede retirar antes de la hora estipulada.
Art. 39 Manual de Procedimiento SSN 2015

En todos los casos la entidad prestadora permitirá la firma de las planillas de asistencia a la actividad, únicamente a aquellos productores que acrediten su identidad mediante la presentación de DNI y CIPAS (Credencial Identificatoria del Productor Asesor de Seguros de la SSN)

Por consultas comunicarse al 0343-4315421 o por mail a capacitacion@apaser.com.ar

SOLICITUD DE INSCRIPCION PCC 

Fuente: Apaser
http://www.apaser.com.ar/curso-de-capacitacion-continuada-en-parana/

posts.author: 刘慧平 长治市中医院 副主任医师
posts.text:
指导意见：
 你好，肾小球滤过率是反应肾脏功能的检查之一，滤过率降低表示肾脏功能已受损。肾脏病变时，由于内皮细胞的损伤，释放血栓形成素，易形成血栓，释放的内皮素也会导致血压升高，所以肾脏的病变，会加重高血压和血栓。建议患者到做肾脏的功能的详细检查，明确肾功能的损害程度，积极治疗，保护肾功能，减少并发症的发生。

posts.author: Наталья Преблагина
posts.title: В Ангарском перинатальном центре прокомментировали смерть врача-акушера
posts.text:
В Ангарском перинатальном центре прокомментировали смерть врача-акушера В Ангарском перинатальном центре прокомментировали смерть врача-акушера 2017-11-07 12:27:50"> Партийный переулок, д. 1, к. 57, с. 3 115093 Москва, Россия info@iz.ru вкл выкл 
Главный врач Ангарского перинатального центра Наталья Бреус заявила, что умершая после дежурства акушер-гинеколог Оксана Кивлева была полностью здорова и противопоказаний для работы в ночное время не имела. Медработник увлекалась подводным плаванием и спортивным ориентированием. Бреус подчеркнула, что в соответствии с трудовым законодательством Кивлева вышла на работу на третий день после суточного дежурства. За трудовую смену она не участвовала ни в одной операции. 
Напомним, СК РФ по Иркутской области начал проверку после сообщений о смерти врача после 30-часового дежурства в перинатальном центре Ангарска. Ответственные сотрудники могут стать подозреваемыми по делу о халатности. Главный акушер-гинеколог региона Наталья Протопопова считает, что Оксана Кивлева скончалась от колоссальных нагрузок на работе. 
Также ИА IrkutskMedia пишет, что представители министерства здравоохранения Иркутской области опровергли полуторачасовое ожидание медицинской помощи женщиной, у которой погиб ребенок на 37-й неделе беременности в Ангарском перинатальном центре. Точное время ожидания будет известно по результатам служебного расследования. По данному факту проводится доследственная проверка. ПОДРОБНЕЕ ПО ТЕМЕ

thread.title: What Makes The Greatest Harpist In DC Today
thread.title_full: What Makes The Greatest Harpist In DC Today

posts.author: Ghufron Djubaidi (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: What Makes The Greatest Harpist In DC Today
posts.text:
By Sandra Wagner 

When it comes to music, people play different instruments to make the songs enjoyable. One of the many pieces played today is the harp. If you want to have the instrument played at your wedding or any other place, you will be forced to get an expert who plays it. The harpist in DC is there to entertain the guest and that every individual is happy.

At the event, you see the harpist strumming the strings and produce the background sounds of music. For this reason, every individual needs to be on the watch and have an individual rhyming and playing the beautiful sounds accompanying the theme of your party. The music played by these entertainers is different from the normal one. You will discover that it is melodic and soothing to events such as dinner and wedding. The entertainer here gives something visual.

These entertainers come on stage with this musical piece. They will be performing for hours at any event invited. Though their role is to ensure the guest remain entertained, they stop for a few minutes to cool and start again. Here, you see them strumming the instrument strings and releasing the beautiful sounds which make every individual happy.

There are several reasons why every client hiring the harpist needs to ask many questions. You must follow a given procedure when hiring to avoid trouble. First, you have to go with a person experienced in this entertainment portfolio. Here, you ask how much they charge to perform at different events. These entertainers charge differently and therefore you need to know how much you pay. Some appear for a few minutes while others will be there until the party ends.

It will be right to get the harpists who agree to play the instrumented and entertain your guests for the period you wants. The instrument is not easy to play and it requires some artistic skills. Based on the event, be it a wedding or performance in between the other local bands, you will ask the service provider how many minutes they will be there and then make the decision.

These entertainers give the kind of music that the guests want to hear. When hiring one, know where they like playing. It could be the wedding or other parties such as the end year company parties. When getting one, ask if they are experts in your field of need. Hire them based on their submissions and the theme of your event.

When planning to bring one, it is always right to plan and have the stage set for the performance. These instruments are big and they require you have enough space. When the stage is set, you need to ask the entertainer to come and inspect it. If they have some advice, you will be told on how to go about improving the stage for greater performances.

In most cases, the person hired will come with their instruments, play and leave. In some strange circumstances, the service provider will ask that you have one at the venue. Those that arrive with their own, charge less. It is ideal that when you are signing the contract, know if you are the one to hire the harp or they will come with one for the performance.




About the Author:

Get a summary of important things to consider when picking a harpist in DC and more info about an experienced harpist at http://www.meghankdavis.com right now.
